snippet.title: Pizza Master VR Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Pizza Master VR is a virtual reality pizza making game. You can play in singleplayer or in asymmetric local co-op mode, where one works as a chef in VR while another works as a waiter on the same computer, using mouse and keyboard. Only the waiter can see and serve the orders while only the chef can create them, so teamwork and communication is important!
Create pizzas from eight core ingredients and serve drinks to please your customers. But with their patience ticking every second, you will have to work fast if you want to become a pizza master. With over 50 levels in total, and 12 recipes to memorize, all gradually increasing in difficulty, you'll never find yourself bored.
Will be released on the 3rd of May, 2020 on Steam Early Access.
Wish list here now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1247720/Pizza_Master_VR/?beta=0
